sentence.Network_en: Officers continued a fingertip search of the area yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察昨天继续对该地区进行拉网式搜查。

sentence.Network_en: David seems to get the whole business at his fingertip.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维似乎对整个事件了如指掌.

sentence.Network_en: In addition, we studied how to improve structure and shape fingertip - sensor.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外, 在指套式传感器的结构和形状方面也做了一些探讨.

jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指信息）近在手边的，唾手可得的

lj.lj_ly: until we have more facts at our fingertips, there is no use in speculating.
lj.lj_ls: 除非我们手边有更多的事实，否则猜测是毫无用处的。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 困难地，艰难地，举步维艰地

lj.lj_ly: the prime minister clung on by his fingertips.
lj.lj_ls: 首相举步维艰地坚持着。

lj.lj_ly: he is a professional to his fingertips.
lj.lj_ls: 他是一个地地道道的专业人士。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 唾手可得：稳定地或固定地得到

entry.def: Your fingertips are the ends of your fingers.

example.ex: The fat and flour are rubbed together with the fingertips as for pastry.
example.tran: 像做油酥面团那样用指尖把脂油和面粉揉搓到一起。

entry.def: If you say that something is at your fingertips, you approve of the fact that you can reach it easily or that it is easily available to you.

example.ex: I had the information at my fingertips and hadn't used it.
example.tran: 资料就在我手边，但一直都没有用。

auth_sentence.content: Not exactly looking, she explored her reconstructed navel with a fingertip.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not exactly looking, she explored her reconstructed navel with a fingertip.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not exactly looking, she explored her reconstructed navel with a fingertip.

auth_sentence.content: They should be large enough for you to stick just your fingertip into.
auth_sentence.res_content: They should be large enough for you to stick just your fingertip into.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They should be large enough for you to stick just your fingertip into.

auth_sentence.content: My thoughts went to the cruelest cut when a friend showed me a particularly vicious one she'd received on her fingertip.
auth_sentence.res_content: My thoughts went to the cruelest cut when a friend showed me a particularly vicious one she'd received on her fingertip.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My thoughts went to the cruelest cut when a friend showed me a particularly vicious one she'd received on her fingertip.

sentences.en: He is an artist to his fingertips.
He touched the parcel lightly with his fingertips.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地用指尖碰了碰包裹。

sentences.en: Massage it lightly with your fingertips.

means.word_mean: 手头有某物随时可供应用

sentences.en: He has parliamentary procedure and the rules and traditions of the House of Commons at his fingertips.
sentences.cn: 他对议院法和下议院的传统惯例都非常熟悉。

sentences.en: Have the nautical chart at your fingertips,and you’ll be able to steer your ship.
